verbose_text: In a search for the cellular proteins targeted by E6 to stimulate Wnt signals, Rampias et al. found that the cellular E3 ligase seven in absentia homolog (Siah-1), which is known to promote beta-catenin degradation via the UPS, is inhibited by the combination of HPV E6 and E7.
evidence: Siah-1), which is known to promote beta-catenin
